name: Demon Prince
description:
A short talk with your fiance - a young demon prince - for the world peace's sake.

  •  7-10 minutes play length
  •  2 Endings (good & bad)
  •  1 CG

I used some free resources from Pexels and Dova syndrome. Please read the CREDIt.txt in the Demon Prince Folder

There  maybe some language mistakes since english is not my first language

Special thanks to the tester: Zalya

This is my first visual novel. Hope you enjoy it as much as i did making it

 ⸜(｡˃ ᵕ ˂ )⸝
